summary: A 12-year-old is traumatised by the murder of his friend, a star basketball player.

Grant|John Zaccaro|Don McGovern|Hal Baylor|Pamela Jones|J. Jay Saunders|Al Stevenson|William Upton|Beverly Hope Atkinson|Tom Maier|Hank Rolike|Sandy Ward|David Moody|Fred Slyter|Bobby Webb|Mike McCants|Eugene Davis Jr.
title: Sin testigos
